Node.definition: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye
= the touch of the lips or the lips and cheeks between two people ► usually as a sign of love and desire, but also to greet or show respect
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= state in which events are well performed, morally and ethically correct, and beneficial to others
= a feeling of profound affection for another person, often accompanied by sexual desire

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
literally: name; hence: = the information that is generally known about a person or deity, which may either be good or bad and has a direct impact on the way this person or deity is regarded
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= causative action by which humans or animals move an object from one location to another, usually with some effort or difficulty
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building
mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= causative action by which humans or deities cause information that is stored in someone else's mind to be reprocessed by speaking about it
= a feeling of profound affection for another person, often accompanied by sexual desire

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex
literally: smoothness; hence: = state in which an event is morally and ethically right
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary
= ethnic group consisting of Arab (עַרְבִי) nomads or Bedouin, known as warriors and sheep herders; ◄ descendants of Kedar
= long strip ◄ of cloth, usually made out of goat's hair or linen, ► sewn together to form larger pieces of cloth used as covering for a tent or for separating one room from another
= man; ◄ son of David (דָּוִד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► king of Judah and Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) given the name Jedidiah (יְדִידְיָהּ) at his birth

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= process by which humans and animals focus their eyes on an object
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
exact meaning unsure; hence: = state in which humans are displeased with other humans

Node.gloss: to place (in a position) > to appoint
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities give (other) humans a certain task or responsibility

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= reference to an unknown location; ► used with the purpose of finding which location that is

= causative action by which humans lead domestic animals to places where they can feed on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people
= reference to an unknown location; ► used with the purpose of finding which location that is
= causative action by which humans cause animals to assume a horizontal position in order to rest
= the time of the day when the sun is at its highest point
= state in which humans wear a piece of clothing wrapped around their body
= a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle
= person that belongs to a group or class of people
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= the impression left by a foot or shoe on the ground

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

= causative action by which humans lead domestic animals to places where they can feed on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the female young of a goat (עֵז)
= temporary construction ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, shepherds, etc.
= female horse (סוּס)
= open vehicle with two or four wheels, pulled by one or more horses; ◄ made of wood and iron; ► used in war or for travelling
= king of Egypt
= action by which humans measure the similarity or dissimilarity between two entities
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
jaw, cheek
exact meaning unknown; probably: = a piece of jewellery worn on the lobe of the ear
= part of the body connecting the rump to the head; ► a ;place to wear ornaments, but also a yoke; ≈ a stiff neck is associated with insolence and pride
= string of objects; ◄ made of precious stones or shells; ► usually worn around the neck; used for personal adornment
exact meaning unknown; probably: = a piece of jewellery worn on the lobe of the ear
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a small, rounded piece of glass, metal, or precious stone used for decorating the human body
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
literally: surrounding; hence: = a group of people that are around someone|exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a piece of furniture upon which a person reclines or lies down

= a leafy bush, less than a meter high, with fragrant smelling, short stems and a tuft of three narrow leaflets at the tip of each stem; its pink flowers are umbrella shaped; ► its tubers are pounded to extract a pungent, pale orange or yellow oil; ≈ associated with fragrance
= a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it
= small container ◄ made of cloth; ► used to transport money, pack aromatic spices in order to put it between clothes, etc .; ≈ associated with possessions and treasures

= the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= the area separating two or mores locations
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= state in which humans, animals, or objects stay in a certain place for an indefinite amount of time
= group of flowers or fruits positioned on one stem

= a shrub that reaches 2 3 meters in height, with opposite leaves and many fragrant white flowers; ► its leaves yield a red juice that people in many countries use for coloring the skin and hair; ≈ associated with fragrance and beauty
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= oasis, also known as Hazezon Tamar (חַצְצֹן תָּמָר) ◄ located in the wilderness (מִדְבָּר) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) on western shore of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70 80 centimeters wide
= length of wood ► supporting the roof of a building

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= length of wood ► supporting the roof of a building

exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
